mapper.select: SELECT report_username AS technician, externalcode2 AS exam_code, rechk_dt AS test_date, result_str AS report_desc, result_flag AS report_status, result_ref AS ref_range, result_unit AS unit , sampleno, rechk_username, report_user FROM vw_checked_labresult WHERE pat_no IN (#{patientcode8}, #{patientcode}) AND pat_typecode = '4' ORDER BY rechk_dt DESC
